GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v5.15.71
GSD.description:
net/sched: taprio: avoid disabling offload when it was never enabled

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.71 by commit f58e43184226e5e9662088ccf1389e424a3a4cbd, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit 9c66d15646760eb8982242b4531c4d4fd36118fd. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net/sched: taprio: avoid disabling offload when it was never enabled
